Title: The Mark of the Berserker (2)
Plot: With Clyde's father Paul possessed by the alien pendant, he takes Clyde off for some fun. With a little help from some old friends, Rani and Luke try and track them down, leading to a waterside confrontation with the Berserker
GuestStars: Joseph Millson, Gary Beadle, Jocelyn Jee Esien, Ace Bhatti, Perry Millward, Huw Higginson, Elijah Baker, Jessica Lewis, Andrew Phillips
